English: Where are you from Neko?
Spanish: ¿De dónde eres Neko?

English: I am from a territory called Akualü
Spanish: Soy de un territorio llamado Akualü

English: Although the elders call it Manaure
Spanish: Aunque los mayores lo denominan Manaure

English: Ah, you came from the wild west and now you're here
Spanish: Ah, vienes del lejano oeste y ahora estas aquí

English: In Nazareth or township of Nazareth as they call it
Spanish: En Nazareth o corregimiento de Nazareth como le dicen

English:
We are in the territory of Usijou´, in Alewalü.
I don't know if you've heard that it's a sacred place.
Spanish:
Estamos en el territorio de Usijou´, en Alewalü.
No se si has escuchado de que es un lugar sagrado.

English:
Yes, it is the only one with some characteristics
different natural
Spanish:
Si, es el único con unas características 
naturales diferentes

English: Yes of course. My grandmother and my mother's grandmother were from here.
Spanish: Si claro. De aquí era mi abuela y la abuela de mi mamá

English: Where is the sea? If over there, from here you can see the sea
Spanish: ¿Por dónde está el mar? si por allá, de aquí se ve el mar

English:
Yes it's true.
Yes, they lived here
Spanish:
Si es verdad. 
Si, ellos vivían aquí

English: But is the sea far from here? Yes, it's far away.
Spanish: ¿pero el mar esta lejos de aquí? Si, está lejos.

English:
They said they moved, they had left their
things as you can see
Spanish:
Ellos dijeron que se mudaron, habían dejado sus 
cosas como puedes ver

English:
There where the pieces of amuchi (ceramics) are,
are their ancestral remains (bone)
Spanish:
Ahí donde están los trozos de amuchi (cerámica), 
están sus restos (hueso) ancestrales

English:
They decided to go to the seashore because
They say they were already bored here
Spanish:
Ellos decidieron irse para la orilla del mar porque 
dicen que ya estaban aburridos aquí

English: Then they left, but they came back again. Yeah. right here
Spanish: Entonces se fueron, pero regresaron otra vez. Si. Acá mismo

English:
This was what you were talking about, right? Yeah.
I can touch it? No. It is prohibited
Spanish:
Esto era de lo que hablabas ¿no? Si. 
¿puedo tocarlo? No. Esta prohibido

English:
You can't touch it, you can only see it. If you touch it
you can get sick
Spanish:
No lo puedes tocar, solo puedes verlo. Si lo tocas 
te puedes enfermar

English:
When you touch it you take away the energies of the dead
that can cause you some harm
Spanish:
Al tocarlo te llevas las energías de los muertos 
que te pueden provocar algún daño

English: Same with your arrival here
Spanish: Igual con tu llegada aquí

English:
TRUE. You had to harmonize with the territory because we
surround the souls of those who lived here
Spanish:
Cierto. Debiste armonizar con el territorio porque nos 
rodean las almas de los que vivían aquí

English:
This belonged to them right? Yes, that's why their souls
They are here because those are their belongings.
Spanish:
¿Esto pertenecía a ellos no? Si, por eso sus almas 
están aquí porque esas son sus pertenencias

English:
This was their territory and they said that no one can
take part of this sand
Spanish:
Este era su territorio y ellos decían que nadie puede 
llevarse parte de esta arena

English: Then we, the Pausayu, arrived to inhabit it.
Spanish: Después llegamos nosotros los Pausayu para habitarlo

English: I understand. And what did they bring from the sea?
Spanish: Entiendo. Y ¿Qué fue lo que trajeron del mar?

English: The sand, they threw it here so that it would stay like this
Spanish: La arena, ellos lo echaban aquí para que quedara así

English:
That is, they brought the sand from the beach in
this desert piece
Spanish:
Es decir, que ellos traían la arena de la playa en 
este pedazo desértico

English:
The old people say that through a dream they were told
to bring the sand from there
Spanish:
Dicen los viejos que a través de un sueño les dijeron 
que trajeran la arena de allá

English:
I'm telling you so you can say it, this part
then they cut it
Spanish:
Te lo digo para que lo digas, esta parte
después lo cortan

English:
Guille said that in the dream they were told
the next
Spanish:
Guille decía que en el sueño a ellos les dijeron 
lo siguiente

English:
That, if they loved this land so much, they could bring the
earth up to here
Spanish:
Que, si amaban tanto esta tierra, podían traer la 
tierra hasta acá

English: and that's what they did. This is how this place originated
Spanish: y eso hicieron. Así es como se origino este lugar

English:
You could say that. That started from a dream
and so on
Spanish:
Podrías decir eso. Que comenzó desde un sueño
y así sucesivamente

English:
So they brought him here, right? Yeah.
They brought it little by little until it spread
Spanish:
Entonces lo trajeron aquí ¿no? Si. 
Lo traían poco a poco hasta que se iba extendiendo

English:
As you can see this before this was small, but after
They expanded it up to there
Spanish:
Como puedes ver esto antes esto era pequeño, pero después 
lo fueron ampliando hasta por allá

English:
Yes, now I understand. How nice to know the history
behind this
Spanish:
Si, ahora comprendo. Que lindo conocer la historia
detrás de esto

English:
Yes of course, in fact, all this that is here
It's also beautiful
Spanish:
Si claro, de hecho, todo esto que está aquí 
también es bello

English:
Yeah. It is very good to make known what
we have because it is part of our Wayuu culture
Spanish:
si. Es muy bueno dar a conocer lo que 
tenemos porque es parte de nuestra cultura wayuu

English:
You will already know that this place exists in La Guajira, Alewalü
will be recognized by the world
Spanish:
Ya sabrán que en La Guajira existe este lugar, Alewalü 
será reconocida por el mundo

English:
Through stories like these you will learn not only
the place but its spirituality
Spanish:
A través de historias como estas conocerán no solo 
el lugar sino su espiritualidad

English:
Since there are also many jewels of
the deceased
Spanish:
Ya que aquí también se encuentran muchas joyas de 
los fallecidos

English:
That is why it is a sacred place because here are the
things from those who created it
Spanish:
Por eso es un lugar sagrado porque aquí están las 
cosas de los que la crearon

English:
People say that here in the north is where
are the most sacred places
Spanish:
Las personas dicen que aquí en el norte es donde 
están los lugares más sagrados

English: And that is why it is important to make them known. Yes of course.
Spanish: Y por eso es importante darlos a conocer. Si claro.

English:
Well, thank you very much for what you shared with us.
Anyway, thanks to you for coming,
Spanish:
Bueno, muchas gracias por lo que nos compartiste. 
Igual gracias a ti por venir,

English: For coming from so far to know our territory
Spanish: Por venir desde tan lejos para conocer nuestro territorio

English:
After winter it doesn't bloom here? No,
Does it stay like this? Yes of course, it gets wet and that's it
Spanish:
¿Después del invierno no florece aquí? No, 
¿se queda así? Si claro, se moja y ya

English:
The animals walk and do not get their paws wet.
You see there is no grass. No.
Spanish:
los animales caminan y no se mojan las patas. 
Ves que no hay pasto. No.

English:
And if it rains a lot? It may rain a lot but still
It does not bloom because it is a sacred place
Spanish:
Y si ¿llueve mucho? Puede que llueva mucho pero igual 
no florece porque es un lugar sagrado

English: The territory is sacred
Spanish: El territorio es sagrado

English:
That was destined. Yes, that's why they were created
ancestors who saw here
Spanish:
Eso estaba destinado. Si, por eso los crearon los 
ancestros que vieron aquí

English:
People who come to Nazareth say that their
ancestors are from here too
Spanish:
Las personas que vienen a Nazareth dicen que sus 
ancestros son de aquí también

English:
Those from Dusakawi (health association) said that their
grandmothers told them that they have ancestors here
Spanish:
Los de Dusakawi (asociación en salud), dijeron que sus 
abuelas les dijeron que tienen ancestros acá

English:
They say they will come back here again.
Yes, that's OK
Spanish:
Ellos dicen que volverán otra vez por aquí. 
Si, eso está bien

English:
I think it's good that they come again so that
learn more, we make you climb the mountains
Spanish:
Me parece bien que vengan de nuevo para que 
conozcan más, los hacemos subir a las montañas

English: Yes, we have to arrive earlier, look, they are already rushing us. Yes, it's true, it is complex.
Spanish: Si, tenemos que llegar mas temprano, mira que ya nos están apurando. Si, es cierto, es complejo.

English:
Because it is already getting dark and we already have
we have to leave because of how sacred it is
Spanish:
Porque ya se está haciendo de noche y ya tenemos 
que irnos por lo sagrado que es

English: You are in Alewalü in the Alewalü Dunes
Spanish: Estas en Alewalü en las Dunas de Alewalü

English: Smile smile. Stretch your hands. That
Spanish: Sonríe, sonríe. Estira las manos. Eso

English: That, that raise your hands, aha say hello, say hello.
Spanish: Eso, eso levanten las manos, aja saluda, saluda.

English: Alewalu
Spanish: Alewalü
